content:
I don't have personal experience, but here are some trendy coffee shops in berlin that are popular among digital nomads:

1. the barn - prenzlauer berg
2. st. oberholz - mitte
3. distrikt coffee - mitte
4. shakespeare and sons - friedrichshain
5. commonground - kreuzberg
6. silo coffee - friedrichshain
7. five elephant - kreuzberg 
8. bonanza coffee heroes - prenzlauer berg 

all of these cafes offer good coffee, free wi-fi and comfortable seating arrangements, perfect for a productive work session.
